location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 2 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to James Farish, Chief Secretary to the Government, General Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a request for the consideration of Government from Coja Arrathoon Malcolm, Linguist at the Bushire Residency. The request concerns having his pay restored to its previous level; it is noted that the Resident has not been able to ascertain the reason as the why his pay was reduced.
